metadata.title: Department's offer
tags: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science (WMiI)

page_content:
(link: https://www.ais.pl/)

*AIS.PL Sp. z o.o.*.
The company, from among its employees, identifies tutors or consultants for groups of students doing an IT project within the "Team Programming" course.
(link: https://www.facebook.com/allegro.tech/)

*Allegro Group*.
Allegro Group - "Partner of the Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics of Nicolaus Copernicus University in Torun" cooperates with the University in the field of student education by having its employees teach.
(link: https://www.amg.net.pl/)

*AMG.net SA.
The company, from among its employees, selects supervisors or consultants for groups of students doing an IT project as part of the "Team Programming" course. It supervises groups of students in the field of business based on the knowledge used to conduct it.
(link: https://pl.atos.net/)

*Atos*.
Advising and consulting on the development of study programs and professional practice programs, consulting on the program of postgraduate studies "IT in foreign languages", cooperating in their organization and strengthening the promotion of the studies, giving opinions on the programs of specializations at the Faculties (the entities competent to carry out the activities of the University under the agreement are the Faculty of Philology and the Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science of UMK).

(link: https://icotera.com/)

*Icotera*.
The Company, from among its employees, typifies tutors or consultants for groups of students performing an IT project within the course 'Team Programming', and will cooperate with the Faculty in organizing student internships and placements in accordance with the study program and the Company's current capabilities and needs.

(link: https://www.neuca.pl)

*NEUCA S.A.*.
Cooperation within the framework of the subject "Team Programming". Expected result: realization of the goals inscribed in the development strategy of Nicolaus Copernicus University for 2011-2020.
(link: https://www.alcatel-lucent.com/)

*NOKIA*.
The company selects from among its employees tutors or consultants for groups of students performing an IT project within the "Team Programming" subject. The Company cooperates with the Faculty in organizing student internships and placements in accordance with the study program and the Company's current capabilities and needs.
(link: https://www.simplito.com/)

*Simplito Ltd.
The company has committed to teach the course "Practical aspects of entrepreneurship".
(link: https://www.centrum-innowacyjno≈õci.pl/)

*TARR Innovation Center Sp. z o.o.*.
Innovation Center committed to conduct classes within the subject "Practical aspects of entrepreneurship".
(link: https://orange.pl)

*Telekomunikacja Polska Joint Stock Company*.
The signed cooperation agreement provides for cooperation in agreeing on topics for research papers, agreeing on topics for master's theses, and presenting and promoting each other's achievements.
(link: https://www.stat.gov.pl/bydgosz/index_PLK_HTML.htm)
*The Statistical Office in Bydgoszcz*.
In addition to cooperation within the framework of the subject "Team Programming", the office offers student internships and accepts students of the Department for internships.
